steps.title: Go to Jubilife City and get the map marker app in the Pokétch building.
steps.content: Go to Jubilife City and get the map marker app in the Pokétch building.

steps.title: There will be a marker on the map that looks like Mesprit.
steps.content: There will be a marker on the map that looks like Mesprit.

steps.title: Do whatever until the marker is on one of the routes next to you.
steps.content: Do whatever until the marker is on one of the routes next to you.

steps.title: Chase him down and look in grass to start the battle if his marker is on top of yours.
steps.content: Chase him down and look in grass to start the battle if his marker is on top of yours.

steps.title: Once in battle, use a fast Pokémon to use Mean Look or throw a Master Ball.
steps.content: Once in battle, use a fast Pokémon to use Mean Look or throw a Master Ball.
